content.rendered:
Below is the Maple Avenue 2 hour delay schedule:

  • Block 1 – 10:00 a.m. – 10:40 a.m.
  • Lunch, Flex, or HomeBase
  • A – 10:42 a.m. – 11:05 a.m.
  • B- 11:07 a.m. – 11:30 a.m.
  • C- 11:32 a.m. – 11:55 a.m.
  • Block 2 – 11:57 a.m. – 12:37 p.m.
  • Block 3 – 12:39 a.m. – 1:19 p.m.
  • Block 4 – 1:21 a.m. – 2:01 p.m.
